promptResponse.title: Prompt Response
promptResponse.description:
You are to bring up the entire CV document and asking if this is the correct document
Also the candidateId (variable) that is the ID of the Candidate__c record has to be in the output

citations.title: Citations
citations.description: The prompt citation response generated by the action based on the specified prompt and input. ensure to have the Candidate__c record ID as the CandidateId variable output
